dcterms:creator: M. A. Ikram
G. G. Brusselle
S. D. Murad
dcterms:description: The Rotterdam Study is a population-based cohort study designed to investigate the incidence and prevalence of various diseases, including age-related macular degeneration, in the elderly population.
dcterms:title: Rotterdam Study (RS)

dcterms:creator: P. Mitchell
W. Smith
K. Attebo
dcterms:description: The Blue Mountains Eye Study is a population-based study that investigates the prevalence and risk factors for age-related eye diseases, including age-related maculopathy.
dcterms:title: Blue Mountains Eye Study (BMES)

dcterms:creator: A. S. Lindblad
P. C. Lloyd
T. E. Clemons
dcterms:description: The Age-Related Eye Disease Study is a long-term, multicenter, prospective study that examines the clinical course of age-related macular degeneration and cataract.
dcterms:title: Age-Related Eye Disease Study (AREDS)
